data.title: Study at Mid Sweden University
data.meta_description: Discover thousands of universities across Europe with programs taught entirely in English. Explore the Beyond The States database of 12,000+ accredited programs today!
data.text:
Mid Sweden University

Campus Kunskapens väg 8, 831 25 Östersund, Sweden

Favorite

Description

Mid Sweden University (MIUN) is a public university located in the middle of Sweden, right in the heart of Northern Europe, and has two campuses, one in Sundsvall and the other in Östersund. MIUN is one of the largest universities in Sweden, with over 16,000 students enrolled in undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

MIUN offers a wide range of programs in English, including business, engineering, education, social sciences, and humanities. The university has a strong focus on research and innovation, and its faculty members are actively involved in collaborative projects with industry and government.

Here are some of the things that prospective students from the United States should know about MIUN:

The language of instruction for English-taught programs at MIUN is English.

The tuition fees for international students are around €2,564 per year.

MIUN has a good reputation for its teaching and research. The university has a number of research institutes and centers, and its faculty members publish regularly in international journals.

MIUN is located in two beautiful and vibrant cities in Sweden, Sundsvall and Östersund. Both cities offer a variety of cultural and recreational opportunities, and they are both close to nature.

Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kA09eEBJX0E-channel=Mittuniversitetet/about

Student Life

Geographically, Mid Sweden University is located in the middle of Sweden, right at the heart of Northern Europe. Mid Sweden University has two campuses: Sundsvall and Östersund. They differ in character and partially in the course programs offered. At Mid Sweden University there are student unions looking after your interests concerning your education and questions related to the social aspects of student life. The student union endeavors to see to it that you get as good an education as possible and that your days of study are as good as they can be. This organization is an organization of students for students.

Housing

The school does not offer accommodation but can put students in touch with housing providers. Housing cost range from 200-400 euros per month.
